subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who have been burned in recent seasons by some of their splashy free agents, signed LaTroy Hawkins for one year and $3.75 million, a deal most significant, perhaps, for what it was not.
snippet: The Yankees, who have been burned in recent seasons by some of their splashy free agents, signed LaTroy Hawkins for one year and $3.75 million, a deal most significant, perhaps, for what it was not.
